title: Matter Exploration Project: Scientific Study of Mass and Volume

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physical quantities (mass/volume) and ability to use simple laboratory equipment
context.additional_context: Enhanced scientific inquiry through parallel implementation of smartphone-based VR simulations and hands-on experiments

learning_goals: Design an experimental protocol to accurately measure the mass and volume of material samples with over 80% accuracy
Compare VR simulation and real experimental data to write a material properties analysis report
Independently solve research problems by applying scientific process skills (question formation, hypothesis setting, variable control)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
